alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile, northwestern Baldwin, southwestern Washington, eastern George and southern Greene Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Citronelle to 8 miles west of Gulfcrest to Lucedale to 17 miles southeast of McLain. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Citronelle, Lucedale, Creola, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Deer Park, Axis, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Wilmer, I65 And AL 158 and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland; Washington
